import React from 'react' import {Card, Badge, Button, Collapse } from 'react-bootstrap' import ReactMarkdown from 'react-markdown' export default function Job({job}) { const [open,setOpen] = React.useState(false) return (
{job.title} - {job.company} {new Date(Date.now).toLocaleDateString} {job.type} {job.location}
) }
